Name: Transformative Cover
Description: A cover that fundamentally changes the vibe of how a song comes across…in a great way. Maybe it was an old classic made new again with completely different instruments. Maybe it’s a cross-genre take. Maybe it went from a downer minor key to upbeat major. Or maybe, just maybe…it’s all of the above.

Name: Fuck Up Some Shit Song
Description: You, a baseball bat, and some of grandma’s china out in the backyard. It’s time to let it all out, bro!

Name: Hot Out of the Oven
Description: A 2024 release that’s already had time to knock your socks off

Name: I’m not crying, you’re crying!
Description: A sad song that—pretend otherwise as much as you’d like—really makes you feel the feels.

Name: Wholesome Rap
Description: It’s got that hard edge of the streets…yet without a curse word to be found. Bonus points if it has a positive takeaway message, to boot. And just to make it extra difficult, no Will Smith picks allowed!

Name: The Headphones Round
Description: Pick a song that rewards a closer listen. Maybe it’s the quiet notes you wouldn’t hear on the kitchen Bluetooth speaker, some intricately layered instruments, a clever use of stereo, or a dynamic range from whisper quiet to full-blown rager.

Name: Oo—eee—ooh—ah—ah, ting—tang, walla—walla—bing—bang!
Description: Best song that prominently features (at least some) gibberish

Name: Surprisingly Deep Pop Song
Description: Catchy, yes. But also with such unexpected profundity that you may even quote it in that college graduation commencement speech (that you’ll tragically never be asked to give).

Name: Interstitial Song
Description: It’s short (under 2.5 minutes). It isn’t quite a full, normal song. Maybe it’s a little strange. But this interlude kills as that glue song, holding together a killer album and adding to its flavor and flow. And most importantly for that glue song…it’s really stuck with you all along.

Name: The Stefan Urquelle Round — Quirky Yet Smooth
Description: Alright technical music nerds — now’s your chance. Pick a song with a somewhat funky beat (aka a time signature that is NOT 4/4) and yet still has a silky smooth flow anyway.

Name: How Deep is Your Cut?
Description: An amazing song with fewer than 500,000 listens on Spotify

Name: Epic Build…But Under 6 Mins
Description: The title says it all. Let this pick’s slow and steady increase of tension and energy be a Stairway to Awesomeness. (But not to Heaven, because that song is eight minutes long!)

Name: The Jury Finds Your Pleasure to be Guilty
Description: This song (and/or the artist as a whole) is a complete joke. Except you secretly love this jam. And you just pray at the end of the year it won’t register as one of your Top Spotify Songs for all to see…
